main: ^I can't believe you killed that thing!
^I... am struggling to believe all this, too.
^Well, my name is- Ow! My name is Ezra. N-Nice to meet ya!
^Glad to meet you, Ezra. My name is Maria.
^That's... one hell of an arm ya got there, Maria!
^Looks an awful lot like the monsters we just ran into.
^You wouldn't be willin' to let me give it a once-over, would ya?
^There's no time for that, we need to get out of here. Neither of us are in good shape.
^Oh, fine. Well, come with me then! I know a place where we can lay low.
^Seems like we might need it, if there's more of these things in the valley.
^Hm. Alright, let's go. I will help you walk, just show me the way.
